```{css}
br {
  content: "";
  margin: 2em;
  display: block;
  font-size: 24%;
}
.wrapper {
  color: black;
  background-color: white;
  border: 1px dashed grey;
  text-align: center;
  background-image: "logo_2023.png";
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  background-position: center center;
  background-size: cover;
  border-bottom: 50px solid orange;
}

.name{
  font-weight: normal;
  font-size: 40px;
  padding-top: 2em;
}

.title{
  font-weight: normal;
  font-size: 25px;
  padding-top: 1em;
}

.coordinates {
  color: black;
  font-size: 25px;
  padding-top: 0.5em;
}

.logo {
  height: 8%;
  float: left;
  margin-left: 10px;
  margin-top: -20px;
  position: absolute;
}
```
